section1.title: Put your Post-it on the cloud! </br> move your reminders across Internet.
section1.description: Task Admin lets you have your reminders at any time, anywhere in the world. Furthermore it offers ease of use and intuitive design.

section2.title: Multi-Device and Multi-Platform responsive design.
section2.description: Manage your Post-it from any device, mobile, tablet, laptop or PC. Always with a interfaces designed to easy to use and accessible from your browser.

section3.title: Easy to use.
section3.description: Our goal is that use Task Admin will become as easy as writing a Post-it.

create.title: Create a Post-it.
create.description: Watch this video and see how easy it is to create a task in Task Admin. Click on green button and enter your Post-it.

edit.title: Edit your Post-it.
edit.description: Editing a post-it is as simple as clicking a button. Watch this video and see how.

complete.title: Complete your task.
complete.description: When you finish a task you can take for completed work and remove the post-it. Click on completed button and ready.
